name: purescript-d3v4
description: a clean new wrapper for (parts of) d3 at version 4

scripts.example-default: bower link && cd examples/default && bower link purescript-d3v4 && bower install && npm run build
scripts.example-block: bower link && cd examples/block && bower link purescript-d3v4 && bower install && npm run build
scripts.example-fivecircles: bower link && cd examples/fivecircles && bower link purescript-d3v4 && bower install && npm run build
scripts.example-barchart: bower link && cd examples/barchart && bower link purescript-d3v4 && bower install && npm run build

author: andrew condon
